item.title: Ryan Coogler’s Post-‘Sinners’ Project Sounds Amazing
item.description: The question, obviously, is what Sinner director Ryan Coogler is going to do next, and it’s not a sequel to that movie.

item.title: How AI Can Leverage Digital Clones And Aid Terminally Ill Patients
item.description: In the end, AI-driven digital legacies are about preserving what makes us human.

item.title: Max’s Best New Show Lands A Perfect 100% Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit Max in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: Ransomware Snitches Wanted — $250,000 Bounty Offered
item.description: If you have information about ransomware groups, individual criminals, or access brokers, you could earn big money by snitching.
